next_jobs.title: Global News & Market Data Source Audit
next_jobs.instructions: Catalog and verify accessible, reliable global news and market data sources (APIs, feeds, etc.) for ingestion.

next_jobs.title: Initial Data Ingestion Pipeline
next_jobs.instructions: Implement src/feeds/news.py and src/feeds/markets.py to pull and normalize news/market data.

next_jobs.title: Arbitrage Signal Engine MVP
next_jobs.instructions: Develop src/arbitrage/signals.py to detect and log basic cross-market arbitrage opportunities.

next_jobs.title: Intelligence Engine MVP
next_jobs.instructions: Build src/intel/engine.py to aggregate, score, and summarize actionable finance/news events.

next_jobs.title: Revenue Engine 1: Curated Reports
next_jobs.instructions: Set up outputs/reports/ and automate generation of daily/weekly news/finance reports.

next_jobs.title: Revenue Engine 2: Arbitrage Alerts
next_jobs.instructions: Automate outputs/alerts/ for real-time arbitrage signals, with webhook/email delivery.

next_jobs.title: Revenue Engine 3: Premium Analytics API
next_jobs.instructions: Implement src/api/analytics.py to expose premium analytics endpoints for paying users.
